name: Mystery Saiyan
summary:
Best Action Card Game is Coming!
The planet is in ruin and during the disaster you can not just stand aside. Build your unique team and try to save the universe! Warrior, your legend will be written by your own! 
* BUILD YOUR TEAMS
How can you begin your story without some powerful friends? Enter the team interface and set your favorite characters to your lineup! They will be follow your step to become the best.
* COLLECT EXOTIC EQUIPMENT SETS
There are lots of exotic equipment in the world! Proper equipment will help you increase ATK, HP, Rebound, Leech, Tenacity, Dodge, Hit and Crit . A complete set can not only make your hero more charming, but also make a big difference to power.
* TO BE THE KING OF THE UNIVERSE
Fight with others in Tournament, Cross-server Arena, and League. You are sure to be nominated if you defeat other players. Eventually, you can prove yourself by beating the BOSS.
NOW, HERE COMES YOUR STORY!
